def.dt: :of a yellow or very light brown color long blond hair blonde curls/locks/braids She has blonde highlights in her hair. His hair was dyed/bleached blond.

:having blond hair a blond actor She was blonde as a child. When used to describe a boy or man, the word is spelled blond. When used for a girl or woman, the word is often spelled blonde. A person with dirty blond hair has very dark blond hair that is almost light brown in color. see also platinum blonde strawberry blonde
:of a very light color a table made of blond wood

:a person who has yellow or very light brown hair The word is spelled blond when used for a boy or man, and it is usually spelled blonde when used for a girl or woman. He's a tall, blue-eyed blond. She's a natural blonde. [=her hair has not been dyed blonde] a bottle/bleached/peroxide blonde [=someone whose hair has been made blond through the use of chemicals] see also platinum blonde strawberry blonde
:a person who has very light blonde hair She dyed her hair and now she's a platinum blonde.
:pale blond or grayish blond ash-blond hair
